reviews.review_msg: Fernanda is a great TA, she's caring and kind. She also made the classes engaging. Participation is really important though and there are a lot of group activities, so if you are on the introverted side you may struggle a little with this class.

Isabel made learning Spanish easy. She is really nice and cares about her students' success. If you are there because you really want to learn Spanish she will go out of her way to help you. Quizzes were very straightforward and no surprises.

Amazing course, totally recommend! However, even though it is listed as an introductory course, having some previous experience with spanish is what will benefit you the most. Lots of memorization of words and grammar concepts, but you it pays off when you can actually learn the language. TA's are super passionate and helpful
